data.text:
@April75Cruel I'm sorry that happened. 

This will embolden callous people. People like Ford.

@ChristyCeeCK This is already negatively affecting me at work. Today a man told me this was all over, that the gov said so on tv, and my store can’t make our own policies because we’re “not above the gov’t.”

@1marzipan @ChristyCeeCK Suspend disbelief and enjoy the absurd. 😝

I’m picturing a Chris Farley type display, but with less finesse.

@RevivalCare @ChristyCeeCK Cartwheels? Really? Do you think his arms could suspend him? He cannot even use an adult snow shovel, even for a photo op. I doubt, with all seriousness, that he could do a successful push-up. He's no Trudeau for body or mind fitness.
@ChristyCeeCK How many cartwheels would it take for Ford to become seriously incapacitated and removed from Premiership?
@ChristyCeeCK Guess it's over. 🙄 Ford called it.  #VoteFordOut2022 #dougfordresign #NeverVoteConservative
@ChristyCeeCK 🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️ he's hopeless. We need to kick them all to the curb on June 2nd..m

@RandomSusla @ChristyCeeCK This immunocompromised person still waiting for a new surgery date feels stressed & abandoned by this govt. He couldn’t even wait until regular surgeries resumed to lift protections & do cartwheels. Just bc you won’t die without a surgery doesn’t mean you don’t need it.

@ChristyCeeCK The very best of #PremierDeath’s ability?! He has delayed and avoided doing anything meaningful. That’s the best he has?! And now he is going to do cartwheels when he eliminates half-asses vaccine passports and the best tool we have in schools? JFC https://t.co/SiJ5acZQ4a
